title.narrative: Improving the business investment environment in Vietnam through supporting the implementation of foreign arbitral awards

description.narrative: The project is designed to enhance the capability of authorities and stakeholders in Vietnam, including its Ministry of Justice, to support Vietnam's effective implementation of the 1958 New York Convention on Recognition and Enforcement of Foreign Arbitral Awards (FAAs) and increase successful recognition of FAAs generating opportunities for international business including UK companies. This will involve Vietnam establishing an Action Plan and a cooperating, collaborating and monitoring mechanism
